name: Fairvale
text:
Fairvale
Fairvale was a city in the vicinity of Twin Peaks, Washington.
History
Coroner Joe Fielding practiced in Fairvale and was called to Twin Peaks to perform the autopsy of Laura Palmer.
Nadine Hurley met with a patent attorney in Fairvale, concerning her invention of silent drape runners.
Behind the scenes
No city of Fairvale exists in the United States. Because of this, the name is possibly a reference to the fictional Fairvale, California, the main setting of the 1959 novel, Psycho and its acclaimed 1960 film adaptation.
